scripts.clean: npm run cleanprep && rm -rf platforms node_modules
scripts.prepare: npm run cleanprep && cp -R ../client/assets app/ && cp -R ../client/app/components app/ && cp -R ../client/app/frameworks app/ && rm -rf app/frameworks/test.framework && rm -rf app/components/**/*.e2e.* && rm -rf app/components/**/*.spec.* && rm -rf app/frameworks/**/**/*.spec.* && rm -rf app/frameworks/**/**/**/*.spec.*
scripts.start.ios: npm run prepare && tns emulate ios
scripts.start.android: npm run prepare && tns emulate android
scripts.start.ios.windows: npm run prepare.windows & tns emulate ios
scripts.start.android.windows: npm run prepare.windows & tns emulate android
